long_description: The 78 Inch Round crossbars with a 1 in. diameter are a main component of Yakima car top multi-sport rack systems. The bars span your vehicle's roof between Yakima Towers, providing a base on which different gear mounts can be attached. Round shape makes it easy to install and remove gear mounts. Fits Yakima's Q Towers, Raingutter Towers, Hi Rise Towers, Double Cross Towers, Rail Rider Towers and Locking Rail Rider Towers. Round crossbars are available in 4 lengths; refer to Yakima Fit List for the minimum length recommended for your vehicle. End caps are packaged with towers, not with crossbars.
short_description: The 78 Inch Round crossbars with a 1 in. diameter are a main component of Yakima car top multi-sport rack systems.
